channel.title: Looking for Halo Reach Doubles Partner - Gamebattles
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu335/shamskm/gamebattles.jpg[/img] [/center] [center][size=24pt]Halo Reach[/size][/center] [center]Ok, so basically I need a Halo Reach Partner for doubles on Gamebattles.... [/center]
[center][size=14pt]My Gamertag: Hot Jamalie[/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Requirements[/size][/center] [center]- Must be able to go positive +10 in Team Swat - Team Snipers - Team Slayer These are really the only things you'll need considering 80% of kids we'll be playing are not pro pro. - Must be able to play on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays - XBL Membership Ofcourse - XBL Standard Microphone, anything better will be appreciated and allowed.[/center]
[left]Also.......[/left]
[center][size=24pt]Team[/size][/center] [center]Also looking for a couple of kids to start a Halo Reach Team with on Gamebattles. Same requirements, once all spots filled the rest will be put there for backup.[/center]
[center][size=10pt]Application[/size]s[/center] [center][size=14pt].::Doubles App::.[/size][/center] [center]Gamertag: Do you meet the requirements?: How long have you been playing?: Do you mind talking and communicating?: Tell a little about yourself(Detail): Gamebattles Username:
[/center]
[center][size=14pt].::Team App::.[/size][/center] [center]Gamertag: Do you meet the requirements?: How long have you been playing?: Do you mind talking and communicating with others?: Tell a little about yourself(Detail): Gamebattles Username: Team Name Suggestion: Email Address(Optional):
[/center]
[center]Doubles partner I will contact in pm somewhere, but team names will go here for a list until all added on Gamebattles.
- Fatal Desire - Hot Jamalie - - - - - - - - [/center]

item.title: Looking for Halo Reach Doubles Partner - Gamebattles
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

Marine5287:

So why don’t you just go on to GameBattles and post this there?

I have, just speeding up the process.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for Halo Reach Doubles Partner - Gamebattles

item.title: Looking for Halo Reach Doubles Partner - Gamebattles
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

[center]
[/center]
[center][size=24pt]Halo Reach[/size][/center]
[center]Ok, so basically I need a Halo Reach Partner for doubles on Gamebattles…
[/center]

[center][size=14pt]My Gamertag: Hot Jamalie[/size][/center]

[center][size=24pt]Requirements[/size][/center]
[center]- Must be able to go positive +10 in Team Swat - Team Snipers - Team Slayer
These are really the only things you’ll need considering 80% of kids we’ll be playing are not pro pro.

  • Must be able to play on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays
  • XBL Membership Ofcourse
  • XBL Standard Microphone, anything better will be appreciated and allowed.[/center]

[left]Also…[/left]

[center][size=24pt]Team[/size][/center]
[center]Also looking for a couple of kids to start a Halo Reach Team with on Gamebattles. Same requirements, once all spots filled the rest will be put there for backup.[/center]

[center][size=10pt]Application[/size]s[/center]
[center][size=14pt].::Doubles App::.[/size][/center]
[center]Gamertag:
Do you meet the requirements?:
How long have you been playing?:
Do you mind talking and communicating?:
Tell a little about yourself(Detail):
Gamebattles Username:

[/center]

[center][size=14pt].::Team App::.[/size][/center]
[center]Gamertag:
Do you meet the requirements?:
How long have you been playing?:
Do you mind talking and communicating with others?:
Tell a little about yourself(Detail):
Gamebattles Username:
Team Name Suggestion:
Email Address(Optional):

[/center]

[center]Doubles partner I will contact in pm somewhere, but team names will go here for a list until all added on Gamebattles.

  • Fatal Desire - Hot Jamalie

[/center]
